WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description: I'm using Visual Studio 2013 and I wonder if it was possible that private members coming from extended classes will not show up because you can't access them anyways and it will remove allot of clutter from IntelliSense.
WorkItem.Summary: Hide private members from extended class
